entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow or rain. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 11 May 2023
